original_text: But if any nation refuses to obey me, I will destroy it completely.’ That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 그들이 순종하지 아니하면 내가 반드시 그 나라를 뽑으리라 뽑아 멸하리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: But if any nation refuses to obey me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 어떤 나라가 나를 거부하면

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
